verses.verse: The word <WH1697> that <WH834> came <WH1961> to <WH413> Jeremiah <WH3414> from <WH4480> <WH854> the LORD, <WH3068> saying, <WH559>

Hear <WH8085> ye <WH853> the words <WH1697> of this <WH2063> covenant, <WH1285> and speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> the men <WH376> of Judah, <WH3063> and to <WH5921> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem; <WH3389>

And say <WH559> thou unto <WH413> them, Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel; <WH3478> Cursed <WH779> be the man <WH376> that <WH834> obeyeth <WH8085> not <WH3808> <WH853> the words <WH1697> of this <WH2063> covenant, <WH1285>

Which <WH834> I commanded <WH6680> <WH853> your fathers <WH1> in the day <WH3117> that I brought them forth <WH3318> <WH853> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> from the iron <WH1270> furnace, <WH4480> <WH3564> saying, <WH559> Obey <WH8085> my voice, <WH6963> and do <WH6213> them, according to all <WH3605> which <WH834> I command <WH6680> you: so shall ye be <WH1961> my people, <WH5971> and I <WH595> will be <WH1961> your God: <WH430>

That <WH4616> I may perform <WH6965> <WH853> the oath <WH7621> which <WH834> I have sworn <WH7650> unto your fathers, <WH1> to give <WH5414> them a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey, <WH1706> as it is this <WH2088> day. <WH3117> Then answered <WH6030> I, and said, <WH559> So be it, <WH543> O LORD. <WH3068>

Then the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Proclaim <WH7121> <WH853> all <WH3605> these <WH428> words <WH1697> in the cities <WH5892> of Judah, <WH3063> and in the streets <WH2351> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> saying, <WH559> Hear <WH8085> ye <WH853> the words <WH1697> of this <WH2063> covenant, <WH1285> and do <WH6213> them.

For <WH3588> I earnestly protested <WH5749> <WH5749> unto your fathers <WH1> in the day <WH3117> that I brought them up <WH5927> <WH853> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> even unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> day, <WH3117> rising early <WH7925> and protesting, <WH5749> saying, <WH559> Obey <WH8085> my voice. <WH6963>

Yet they obeyed <WH8085> not, <WH3808> nor <WH3808> inclined <WH5186> <WH853> their ear, <WH241> but walked <WH1980> every one <WH376> in the imagination <WH8307> of their evil <WH7451> heart: <WH3820> therefore I will bring <WH935> upon <WH5921> them <WH853> all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> of this <WH2063> covenant, <WH1285> which <WH834> I commanded <WH6680> them to do; <WH6213> but they did <WH6213> them not. <WH3808>
And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, A conspiracy <WH7195> is found <WH4672> among the men <WH376> of Judah, <WH3063> and among the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem. <WH3389>

They are turned back <WH7725> to <WH5921> the iniquities <WH5771> of their forefathers, <WH7223> <WH1> which <WH834> refused <WH3985> to hear <WH8085> <WH853> my words; <WH1697> and they <WH1992> went <WH1980> after <WH310> other <WH312> gods <WH430> to serve <WH5647> them: the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> and the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063> have broken <WH6565> <WH853> my covenant <WH1285> which <WH834> I made <WH3772> with <WH854> their fathers. <WH1>

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD, <WH3068> Behold, <WH2009> I will bring <WH935> evil <WH7451> upon <WH413> them, which <WH834> they shall not <WH3808> be able <WH3201> to escape; <WH3318> <WH4480> and though they shall cry <WH2199> unto <WH413> me, I will not <WH3808> hearken <WH8085> unto <WH413> them.

Then shall the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063> and inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem <WH3389> go, <WH1980> and cry <WH2199> unto <WH413> the gods <WH430> unto whom <WH834> they <WH1992> offer incense: <WH6999> but they shall not <WH3808> save them at all <WH3467> <WH3467> in the time <WH6256> of their trouble. <WH7451>

For <WH3588> according to the number <WH4557> of thy cities <WH5892> were <WH1961> thy gods, <WH430> O Judah; <WH3063> and according to the number <WH4557> of the streets <WH2351> of Jerusalem <WH3389> have ye set up <WH7760> altars <WH4196> to that shameful thing, <WH1322> even altars <WH4196> to burn incense <WH6999> unto Baal. <WH1168>

Therefore pray <WH6419> not <WH408> thou <WH859> for <WH1157> this <WH2088> people, <WH5971> neither <WH408> lift up <WH5375> a cry <WH7440> or prayer <WH8605> for <WH1157> them: for <WH3588> I <WH589> will not <WH369> hear <WH8085> them in the time <WH6256> that they cry <WH7121> unto <WH413> me for <WH1157> their trouble. <WH7451>

What <WH4100> hath my beloved <WH3039> to do in mine house, <WH1004> seeing she hath wrought <WH6213> lewdness <WH4209> with many, <WH7227> and the holy <WH6944> flesh <WH1320> is passed <WH5674> from <WH4480> <WH5921> thee? when <WH3588> thou doest evil, <WH7451> then <WH227> thou rejoicest. <WH5937>

The LORD <WH3068> called <WH7121> thy name, <WH8034> A green <WH7488> olive tree, <WH2132> fair, <WH3303> and of goodly <WH8389> fruit: <WH6529> with the noise <WH6963> of a great <WH1419> tumult <WH1999> he hath kindled <WH3341> fire <WH784> upon <WH5921> it, and the branches <WH1808> of it are broken. <WH7489>

For the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> that planted <WH5193> thee, hath pronounced <WH1696> evil <WH7451> against <WH5921> thee, for <WH1588> the evil <WH7451> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> and of the house <WH1004> of Judah, <WH3063> which <WH834> they have done <WH6213> against themselves to provoke me to anger <WH3707> in offering incense <WH6999> unto Baal. <WH1168>
And the LORD <WH3068> hath given me knowledge <WH3045> of it, and I know <WH3045> it: then <WH227> thou showedst <WH7200> me their doings. <WH4611>

But I <WH589> was like a lamb <WH3532> or an ox <WH441> that is brought <WH2986> to the slaughter; <WH2873> and I knew <WH3045> not <WH3808> that <WH3588> they had devised <WH2803> devices <WH4284> against <WH5921> me, saying, Let us destroy <WH7843> the tree <WH6086> with the fruit <WH3899> thereof, and let us cut him off <WH3772> from the land <WH4480> <WH776> of the living, <WH2416> that his name <WH8034> may be no <WH3808> more <WH5750> remembered. <WH2142>

But, O LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> that judgest <WH8199> righteously, <WH6664> that triest <WH974> the reins <WH3629> and the heart, <WH3820> let me see <WH7200> thy vengeance <WH5360> on <WH4480> them: for <WH3588> unto <WH413> thee have I revealed <WH1540> <WH853> my cause. <WH7379>

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of <WH5921> the men <WH376> of Anathoth, <WH6068> that seek <WH1245> <WH853> thy life, <WH5315> saying, <WH559> Prophesy <WH5012> not <WH3808> in the name <WH8034> of the LORD, <WH3068> that thou die <WH4191> not <WH3808> by our hand: <WH3027>

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> Behold, <WH2009> I will punish <WH6485> <WH5921> them: the young men <WH970> shall die <WH4191> by the sword; <WH2719> their sons <WH1121> and their daughters <WH1323> shall die <WH4191> by famine: <WH7458>

And there shall be <WH1961> no <WH3808> remnant <WH7611> of them: for <WH3588> I will bring <WH935> evil <WH7451> upon <WH413> the men <WH376> of Anathoth, <WH6068> even the year <WH8141> of their visitation. <WH6486>
